message.body: Cool, let me ask my dad what he wants for it
Hey buddy. I prolly want that freezer if it's still available
It's real new yes, my dad joined a meat club for a while and had to buy the freezer as part of the deal. He'd like to get $1500
I think that's about half what retail is
I can't swing that right now. Yeah I just looked up those freezers and they are top notch
It does sound like a lot, so it's prolly worth that much huh?
You Could beat him up a little on the price and prolly arrange a payment plan, I'm anxious to get it out of the basement
I am trolling craigslist for units in the $50 to $200 range so I'm not sure we are going to find a compromise we'll both be happy with
